short_summary: Environmental and Climate Change Canada requires Junior Junior Project Leaders For Real Property (4 x persons).
tags: Real Property Project Management ,Junior Project Leader
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title: 4.3 Project Leader For Real Property, Junior Level.
### Solicitation Number: 5000062423
### Date: October 18, 2022

### Introduction

The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking the services of four (4) Project Leaders for Real Property, Junior Level, to support Realty and Business Integrity Service (RBIS) in providing mandatory real estate transactional services to the ECCC organization.

### Objective
The primary objective of this requirement is to engage the services of experienced Project Leaders in Real Property, Junior Level, who can provide expert support to the RBIS team in managing real property projects. The successful contractor(s) will be responsible for:

*   Supporting the RBIS team in managing real property projects, including project initiation, planning, execution, and closure.
*   Collaborating with RBIS staff and other stakeholders to ensure that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the required quality standards.
*   Providing guidance and support to junior team members, as required.

### Scope
The contract is expected to commence on April 1, 2023, and will run for a period of one (1) year, with the option to extend for up to three (3) additional one (1) year periods.

### Security Clearance
The successful contractor(s) will require a minimum security clearance of Reliability for both the company and resources.

### Trade Agreements
This requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Contracting Authority
The Contracting Authority for this requirement is Moufid Samri, who can be contacted at (438) 815-0818 or [moufid.samri@ec.gc.ca](mailto:moufid.samri@ec.gc.ca).

### Closing Date
The closing date for this requirement is November 10
